FuncDef:
The service-ha hot-backup enable command enables HA hot backup.
The undo service-ha hot-backup enable command disables HA hot backup.
By default, HA hot backup is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To improve device availability and service reliability, run the service-ha hot-backup enable command to enable HA hot backup. This command is used in the inter-board hot backup scenario.
If VSUI-160-Es are used as both active and standby service board, the recommended switchback time of inter-board backup is 720s.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the display service-ha global-information hot-backup-state command to view the HA hot backup status.
Precautions
VPN NAT inter-chassis hot backup is mutually exclusive with traffic distribution on an outbound interface, centralized CGN providing cold backup for distributed CGN, and the virtual cluster function.
CGN inter-chassis hot backup is mutually exclusive with inter-board hot backup, outbound-interface NAT, and the virtual cluster function.
